summary: Hyperscalers (Microsoft, Google, Meta) are aggressively increasing AI infrastructure spending in 2024, with Microsoft raising capex to $35B, Google increasing by ~50% YoY, and Meta projecting $37B. GPU rental prices remain high at $3.18/hr, indicating sustained demand. Major model releases (GPT-5 mid-2025, Gemini 2) are imminent, fueling market optimism.
